events.title: Part-time Epitech as Freelancer
events.body: I continue my experience at Neolink from the group Berger-Levrault as a Freelancer for 2 days a week.

events.title: 5th year Epitech
events.body: The first 6 months of the final year of Epitech are dedicated to my study project the Epitech Innovative Project and allow me to participate in various seminars or modules.

events.title: Freelancing in Dublin
events.body:
During my year in Dublin, I worked 2 days a week as a freelancer at Neolink from the group Berger-Levrault

My main mission was to develop an Optimized Agenda for their product NeoGestion.

Since I had been working with Neolink for over 2 years, I was able to be autonomous to develop a project remotely.

events.title: 4th year at TU Dublin - Epitech Curriculum
events.body:
I obtained a double degree in IT Management at Technological University Dublin.

During this year, I took courses in management, business strategy, project quality, organization always related to IT

I also continued to develop Nysos, our Epitech Innovative Project, at a rate of one day per week. A progress report was made monthly with our referent.

events.title: CDD at Neolink
events.body:
Covid 19 cancelled my 4th year which was supposed to take place in an Australian university. I then made the choice to do a sabbatical year to postpone my departure.

During this year I worked at Neolink of the Berger-Levrault group and participated in the development of their tool Neogestion. This period allowed me to strengthen my professional experience.

events.title: End of 3rd year Epitech Internship
events.body:
I continued the missions of my part-time at Neolink by doing a full-time internship this time.

March 2019 is also the beginning of Covid 19, so I did this internship in telecommuting.

events.title: Volunteering at DevFest
events.body: The DevFest is a festival of technical conferences aimed at developers.

events.title: Part-time Epitech at Neolink Start-up
events.body:
I did a part-time of 2 days a week at Neolink in Blois, during which I did evolutionary maintenance:

  • Development of features
  • Ticket and bug processing
  • Daily reporting

events.title: 3rd year at Epitech
events.body:
The year begins with the last pool of my curriculum, which aims to define our Epitech Innovative Project. This project will be worked on until the middle of the 5th year.

It continues with various projects: Mobile Application, Web Application, AI, DevOpsâ€¦

events.title: Summer contract with Neolink Startup
events.body: Discovery and handling of the Framework of Neolink, integration of new features in a collaborative platform.

events.title: Volunteering at Web2day
events.body:
The Web2day is a festival of Tech conferences in Nantes.

My role was to be a speaker driver, which allowed me to meet Tech personalities and exchange with them.

events.title: 2nd year at Epitech
events.body:
The 2nd year begins with a pool of C++.

It allows to carry out several projects mainly in C++ but also to discover other languages like Haskell.

events.title: English internship in London
events.body:
I went to London for 4 months to improve my English by taking classes at Twin every day.

I reached B2 level and increased my TEPITECH (Toeic) score by 250 points.

events.title: Participation in Epitech's communication
events.body:
During my first year, I participated in open house days and student fairs to present Epitech.

I also accompanied several students who were interested in joining Epitech during discovery days.

events.title: 1st year at Epitech
events.body:
Epitech starts with 5 intensive weeks of immersion with the famous piscine where we have to complete lists of exercises in C every day.

After these 5 weeks, the projects of the 1st year mainly in C and other evaluations such as TEPITECH (TOEIC) or IT MCA, (IT culture multiple choice test) begin.

events.title: Temporary missions
events.body:
I completed the following temporary missions:

  • But - Material handler
  • IntermarchÃ© - Inventory clerk
  • DÃ©fi entreprises communication Chambord - Material handler

events.title: BaccalaurÃ©at S with Honors
events.body:
I obtained my BAC S SVT with the specialization ISN 'Informatics and Digital Science'.

It's thanks to this specialization that I decided to study computer science and join Epitech.
